sourcesContent:
{{ruta}}
import { Component} from '@angular/core'; import { Router } from '@angular/router' @Component({ selector: 'app-inicio', templateUrl: './inicio.component.html', styleUrls: ['./inicio.component.css'] }) export class InicioComponent { ruta:string="asd" constructor(private router: Router ){ router.events.subscribe((val) => { if(this.ruta!=router.url){ let aux =router.url this.ruta=aux.at(1)?.toUpperCase()+ aux.substring(2) if(this.ruta=="Home"){ this.ruta="Información" } } }); } }
